price: 20. Dan kalau bukan karena karunia Allah dan rahmat-Nya kepadamu (niscaya kamu akan ditimpa azab yang besar). Sungguh, Allah Maha Penyantun, Maha Penyayang.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha raūfun raḥīmun
